FrostKnife.name: FrostKnife
FrostKnife.desc:
A cyan knife.
Touching it makes you feel like it's snowing...

CrystalKnife.name: CrystalKnife
CrystalKnife.desc:
A knife made of crystals.
...Wait, that magic isn't yours...

HeavySword.name: HeavySword
